attributes.action: Cancel the BBC tv licence and make it a voluntary subscription service
attributes.additional_details: Slowly but surely the BBC are chipping away at "Britishness" and supporting every left wing agender they can find, they are supposed to be impartial but left that a long time ago
attributes.background: The BBC has long been left wing and anti British, its treatment of pensioners is disgusting and now they want to ban british songs "Land of Hope and Glory" etc
